metadata.title: CVE-2022-3567 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability has been found in Linux Kernel and classified asproblematic. This vulnerability affects the functioninet6_stream_ops/inet6_dgram_ops of the component IPv6 Handler. Themanipulation leads to race condition. It is recommended to apply a patch tofix this issue. VDB-211090 is the identifier assigned to thisvulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3567` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-56-generic - 5.15.0-56.62
linux-image-5.15.0-56-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-56.62
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-56-generic - 5.15.0-56.62
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-56-generic-64k - 5.15.0-56.62
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1024-kvm - 5.15.0-1024.29
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-56.62').
linux-kvm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1024.29').
linux-aws package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1026.30').
linux-azure package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1029.36').

linux-ibm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1021.24').

linux-oem-5.17 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.17.0-1024.25').
linux-raspi package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1021.23').
linux-oem-6.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0.0-1012.12').
linux-oem-6.1 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-1004.4').
linux-hwe-5.19 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1').

linux-azure-5.19 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1020.21~22.04.1').
linux-aws-6.2 package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-lowlatency-hwe-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-lowlatency-hwe-6.5, was pending').
linux-gcp-6.2 package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-azure-6.2 package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-azure-fde-6.2 package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
